name: Jumping Jacks
setup: Stand tall, feet together, arms at sides
Brace lightly and keep ribs stacked over pelvis
steps: Jump feet wider than hips while raising arms overhead
Land softly and immediately jump feet back together while arms return to sides
safety: If impact-sensitive, use step jacks (step one foot out at a time) and keep range small.

prescriptionHints.notes: Keep impact tolerable; use as warm-up or light conditioning.

joints.notes: Land softly; reduce range or switch to step jacks if joints complain.
